title: LIOC increases fuel prices again
content: Lanka Indian Oil Company (LIOC) has decided to increase prices of Diesel by Rs 15 per Litre and Petrol by Rs 20 per Litre with effect from midnight today.Accordingly, Petrol 92-Octane is sold at Rs. 204 while Desel at Rs. 139.This becomes 2nd fuel price revision by LIOC this month.
